name: Double Unders
description: A high-intensity cardio exercise using a jump rope, involving two passes of the rope under the feet for each jump. Improves coordination, agility, and cardiovascular endurance.

name: Shoulder Pass-Throughs
description: Dynamic shoulder warm-up exercise involving passing a PVC pipe or resistance band overhead and behind the back. Enhances shoulder mobility and flexibility, preparing for overhead movements.

name: Toes-to-Bar
description: Core exercise performed hanging from a pull-up bar, involving bringing the toes to touch the bar. Targets the abdominal muscles and improves grip strength and coordination.

name: Box Jumps
description: Explosive lower body exercise involving jumping onto a plyo box or elevated surface from a standing position. Develops lower body power, explosiveness, and coordination.

name: Ring Rows
description: Upper body exercise using suspension rings, involving pulling the body up while maintaining a horizontal position. Targets the back and biceps, improving upper body strength and stability.

name: Wall Balls
description: Full-body exercise combining a squat with a overhead medicine ball throw against a wall. Engages the legs, shoulders, and core, promoting strength, power, and coordination.

name: Kettlebell Swings
description: Dynamic full-body exercise involving swinging a kettlebell between the legs and up to shoulder level. Targets the hamstrings, glutes, and core, enhancing posterior chain strength and power.

name: Handstand Hold
description: Upper body exercise involving holding a handstand position against a wall. Develops shoulder stability, core strength, and overall body control.

name: Dumbbell Thrusters
description: Compound exercise combining a squat with an overhead press using dumbbells. Targets the legs, shoulders, and core, providing a full-body strength and conditioning workout.

name: Burpee Box Jumps
description: High-intensity full-body exercise combining a burpee with a box jump. Engages the legs, shoulders, and cardiovascular system, improving strength, endurance, and explosiveness.
